channel.title: bbcnews TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from bbcnews

item.title: The 33-year-old died of hypothermia on a mountain climbing trip that went horribly wrong - her boyfriend is accused of leaving her unprotected and exhausted close to the summit in stormy conditions while he went to get help. #Mountain #Climb #Austria #BBC
item.description: The 33-year-old died of hypothermia on a mountain climbing trip that went horribly wrong - her boyfriend is accused of leaving her unprotected and exhausted close to the summit in stormy conditions while he went to get help. #Mountain #Climb #Austria #BBC
